title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Learning Design and TPACK Framework for Pre-Service Language Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory knowledge and language instruction experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the seven elements of the TPACK framework when designing technology-enhanced lessons
Learners can create a technology-integrated design plan linked to language subjects through mobile-based collaborative activities
Learners can apply single/integrated TPACK elements to actual lesson designs according to the D-TPACK framework
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
